mapper.sql: guid, orggroupname, orggroupcode, clientcode,remark, creator, createtime
mapper.delete: delete from cr_accessgroup where guid in ( ${value} )
mapper.insert:
insert into cr_accessgroup
guid,
orggroupname,
orggroupcode,
clientcode,
remark,
creator,
createtime,
#{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orggroupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orggroupcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clientcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update cr_accessgroup
orggroupname = #{orggroupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orggroupcode = #{orggroupcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clientcode = #{clientcode,jdbcType=BIT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cr_accessgroup set orggroupname = #{orggroupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orggroupcode = #{orggroupcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clientcode = #{clientcode,jdbcType=BIT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cr_accessgroup where orggroupcode = #{orggroupcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
